Uses of Package
org.apache.ignite.ml

  • Packages that use org.apache.ignite.ml 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.ml
    Root ML package.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering
    Contains clustering algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.estimators
    Contains estimation algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.models
    Contains main APIs for kNN classification algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.regression
    Contains main APIs for kNN regression algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.nn
    Contains neural networks and related classes.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.nn.trainers.local
    Contains multilayer perceptron local trainers.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.optimization
    Contains implementations of optimization algorithms and related classes.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.regressions.linear
    Contains various linear regressions.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group
    Contains group trainers.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.local
    Contains local trainers.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.models
    Contains decision tree models.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased
    Contains column based decision tree algorithms.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml used by org.apache.ignite.ml 
    Class and Description
    Exporter
    Exporter for models, D - model representation object, P - path to resources.
    Model
    Basic interface for all models.
